<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Creates an API token which is needed to call the API endpoints."}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/auth/token"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Creates an API token which is needed to call the API endpoints.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"description":"<b>Client ID</b> and <b>Client Secret</b> should be generated from the API section in the [Zählerfreunde admin portal](https://www.zaehlerfreunde.de/admin/api).\n\n<img src=\"https://cdn.zaehlerfreunde.com/documentation/create_api_token_sc.png\" width=35% />\n\n<img src=\"https://cdn.zaehlerfreunde.com/documentation/create_api_token_sc_1.png\" width=35% />\n\nIf you dont have admin access to the Zählerfreunde admin portal please send an email to [kontakt@zaehlerfreunde.com](mailto:kontakt@zaehlerfreunde.com).\n","required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"required":["clientId","clientSecret"],"properties":{"clientId":{"type":"string","description":"unique client id"},"clientSecret":{"type":"string","description":"unique client secret"}},"title":"NewApiToken"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"accessToken":{"type":"string"}},"title":"ApiToken"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
